paper_metadata.title: Effectiveness of a Family-Based Economic Empowerment Intervention on Multidimensional Poverty Among Adolescents Living with HIV in Uganda: Results from a Longitudinal Cluster Randomized Trial

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: We constructed a Multidimensional Poverty Index of individual and household indicators, including health, assets, housing and family dynamics
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: a longitudinal randomized control trial (2012-2018) with 702 adolescents living with HIV

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: we use data from Suubi+Adherence, a longitudinal randomized control trial
